metadata.title: CVE-2015-1381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in pcrs.c in Privoxy before 3.0.23allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault ormemory consumption) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1').
